snippet.title: Final Fantasy VIII Trailer
snippet.description: I am just trying to gauge interest with this one. The next game in the series I plan to play, FF VI, doesn't bode so well in its transition to trailer form. So, I decided to make a trailer for VIII, just to see what everyone thinks of the idea. So, what do you think?
